title: Admin Console Access
test_description: Validate admin console access via SCIM API
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const authorizedStep = stepResults.test_authorized_access; const unauthorizedStep = stepResults.test_unauthorized_access; const expected_result = 'Authorized: 200/403, Unauthorized: 401/403'; let actual_result = 'Not tested'; if (!authorizedStep || !unauthorizedStep) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Missing API responses', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-101-3', title: 'Admin Console Access', expected_result, actual_result }; } const authorizedStatus = authorizedStep.status; const unauthorizedStatus = unauthorizedStep.status; actual_result = `Authorized: ${authorizedStatus}, Unauthorized: ${unauthorizedStatus}`; const authorizedSuccess = authorizedStatus === 200 || authorizedStatus === 403; const unauthorizedSuccess = unauthorizedStatus === 401 || unauthorizedStatus === 403; if (authorizedSuccess && unauthorizedSuccess) { return { status: 'pass', message: 'Admin console access control working properly', code: 'ACCESS_CONTROL_VERIFIED', test_id: 'IQ-101-3', title: 'Admin Console Access', expected_result, actual_result }; } else { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Admin console access control not working properly', code: 'ACCESS_CONTROL_FAILED', test_id: 'IQ-101-3', title: 'Admin Console Access', expected_result, actual_result }; } }
manual_procedure: Attempt unauthorized access via SCIM API.
